comment.body:
Sorry, very long text and did not read it all ... You are a human, have a brain and uses your brain to think and develop and is doing it very well. In 10-20 years we humans will have invented real AI and it will have exactly the same tasks as you, think and develop. 
My personal world view. The world is too fantastic to be real. But maybe one day we will be able, with the help of our new AI friends, to reveal the universe's deepest secret ...
